rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: Spacious, open-plan area integrated with the kitchen and dining space. Minimalist design with neutral color palette.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Open plan adjacent to living room; equipped with wheelchair accessible work surfaces, easy-to-reach cabinets and appliances

rooms.name: master bedroom
rooms.description: Large master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in storage units. Vastu compliant placement of bed and window for energy flow.

rooms.name: bedroom2
rooms.description: Guest bedroom designed in a minimalist style; includes natural light and efficient storage solutions.

rooms.name: bedroom3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample window space for ventilation and Vastu compliant room layout.

rooms.name: bedroom4
rooms.description: Fourth bedroom designed to be versatile; potential for study or hobby area with adequate natural lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance from the front side of the corner plot. Wheelchair accessible ramp leading to foyer and living room.
Large windows with minimal framing to maximize natural light, placed in accordance with Vastu principles for positive energy flow
